litematica_generator.contribute: Want your own machines such as world eaters to be collected here? Contribute to Reden now! Email me at me@redenmc.com for more information.
litematica_generator.description: Generate Litematica files online from Reden projects, e.g. World Eaters
litematica_generator.not_logged_in: Guest users can only generate 5 times per minute, please log in to unlock this limit
litematica_generator.select: What do you want to generate today?
litematica_generator.size_description: The size of the machine in x, y, z. for world eaters, the z size is the distance between the starting side and the returning side.
litematica_generator.size_max: The maximum size of the machine is {size}
litematica_generator.size_min: The minimum size of the machine is {size}
litematica_generator.size_mod: The size divided by {mod} must leave {rem}
litematica_generator.title: Litematica Online Generator

edit.email_desc: This is the email you used to register, and to receive our security notifications, such as reset your password.

password.desc: You can change your password here.
password.first: This is the first time you login, please change your password as soon as       possible.
password.requirements: Password must contain at least 8 characters, and include letters and numbers
password.title: Password

preference.showGithub_desc: Whether to show your GitHub to other users.

edit.username_desc: This is the username you use to login. You can change it once every 48 hours.
edit.username_timer: You can change your username again in {0} hours

reden.description: Provide a one-stop working environment for redstone developers and become the best redstone debugging and teaching tool.

download_page.sorry_constructing: Sorry, our download page is under construction, we suggest you to download at

community_intro.discord: Join our Discord server to chat with other redstone developers and get help from the community.
community_intro.open_source: Reden is an open-source project and free for everyone. We welcome everyone to contribute to Reden including code, documentation, wiki, and more.
community_intro.sponsor: Reden is sponsored by the community. We appreciate every sponsor who supports us.
community_intro.title: Community
community_intro.wiki: Reden Wiki contains almost everything you need to know about redstone ans Reden. It is also a great place to share your knowledge with the community.

feature_intro.debugger: Can't figure out why your redstone contraption isn't working? Reden Debugger can help you see how the game exactly processes your redstone contraption.
feature_intro.rvc: RVC (Reden Version Control) is a version control system designed for redstone. It allows you to manage your redstone projects in all versions with ease.
feature_intro.title: Features
feature_intro.undo: Made a mistake? Reden can quickly undo your actions by just pressing Ctrl+Z. All chain reactions will be undone.

email_verification.message: We have sent an email to {email} with a link to complete your registration. If you don't see the email, please check other places it might be, like your junk, spam, social, or other folders.
email_verification.title: One more step

password.strength: Password is not strong enough, please use at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase and numbers.

successful.message: Please check your email to complete the registration
successful.title: Register Successful

sponsors.badge: You can get this Sponsor badge by supporting us, and it will be displayed on your profile.
sponsors.description: Reden is supported by you, and we are sincerely grateful to every sponsor.
sponsors.notice: Reden is an open-source project and always free for everyone. We receive no funding from any company or organization. We rely on your support to keep the project running. When you support us, you will be listed here as a sponsor so please make sure you provide your name and email address when you donate. Thank you for your support!
sponsors.title: Sponsors

user.contributor_hover: This user has contributed to this project
user.developer_hover: This user is an active developer of this project
user.sponsor_hover: This user has sponsored this project
user.staff_hover: This user is a staff member of this project
